column5: Was looking to head out and try some bows.  I'd like to fish out of boat, because it's way more fun.  Anyone know if I can fish this area by boat?  Thx  Joe

I havent been there in a few years, we used to fish just outside of the nets. Good catches of escaped rainbows to be had. Early summer was the best time for us, Make sure you have all your safety equipment on board. OPP constantly checking that area. Not a big secret, lots of people fish there.
You can launch off the natives property for 15 bucks I believe and go to the inner nets or launch from parry sound for free and head over to the nets in the main basin.
